body.name: OIGAE Washable Rug 4x6, Vintage Medallion Area Rugs with Non-Slip Backing, Non-Shedding Floor Mat Throw Carpet for Living Room Bedroom Kitchen Laundry Home Office, Cream/Multi

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【Non-Shedding & Stain Resistant】Expertly woven by machine without pile surface use premium recycled polyester for a lightweight yet durable, and reinforced overlock edges which is virtually non-shedding, spill & stain-resistant; Eco-Friendly, environment first materials and manufacturing processes

【Anti-Slip & Foldable】The area rug features an anti-slip TPR backing that can help the rug stay in place well, sufficient grip to prevent dangerous slides and slips, safe for everyday indoor or outdoor busy area for kids or pet's activity. Sometimes when you need a Washable Rug, you’ll buy a Rug Cover and a Rug Pad, now we combine them into one piece. One piece is all, you don’t need to pay for an extra rug pad

【High Traffic Area Rug】The ultra-thin area rug are made with everyday use in mind, its low pile height allows for convenient placement in entryways, underneath furniture, never get caught beneath doors and won't create a tripping hazard. Perfect for high-traffic areas of your home such as the living room, bedroom, dinning room, kitchen, entryways hallways or patio yard

【Machine Washable & Easy Care】With the stain-resistant and washable rug, you can simply toss it into the machine and keep it looking good as new after every wash. Machine wash in cold water and not to add bleach. Quickly air-dry due to the thin pile design; Use vacuum cleaner, broom, or wipe for daily care,easy to clean and maintain

【Classic & Timeless Styles】This printed rugs features design floral medallion patterns with purposeful distressing to add vintage appeal to your space. The antique bohemian rugs brings a traditional and timeless with a beautiful printed lived-in design to your home, from the living room, bedroom, dining room, playroom, entryway, nursery, dorm room or kitchen, you can always find a chic rug ties your home décor together

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Kids & Pets Friendly--- We care for children and pets more than anything. Producing organic and spill & stain-resistant rugs is our priority.

Our faux wool throw area rugs are made of enhanced synthetic durable fibers,not only ultra-soft but also resists color fading. Whether you step on with bare feet or laying on with your children or pets, you can feel the warmth and coziness underneath.Reinforced overlock edges which is virtually non-shedding. Sturdy construction can make area rugs last for years

We use the most popular TPR anti-slip technology. The TPR material on the back not only prevents the carpet from moving and slipping , but also increases the weight of the carpet and improve safetyThe low-pile design can make the carpet never won’t get stuck, convenient placement in entryways, near doorways, and underneath furniture and easier to clean. Suits for high traffic areas like living room, kids room or landing spaces.

Cleaning Instructions: Dust and dirt on the surface can be removed easily. Usually we can use vacuum cleaner or scrubber to clean the carpet, and when there are stains on the carpet you can put the washing machine to clean it.Easy Care: Please unfold the rug when you receive it. There will be creases at the beginning, please don't worry. Use your hand to gently smooth them out, flatten them on the floor and walk around, the creases will disappear within a week.

4' x 6' ---Best for: living rooms, dining rooms, kitchens. Washer size: 2.2 or 3.8+ cubic feet5' x 7' ---Best for: living rooms, dining rooms, kitchens. Washer size: 3.8+ cubic feet8' x 10'---Best for: living rooms, dining rooms, bedrooms kitchens or kids room etc. Washer size: 4.2+ cubic feet9' x 12'---Best for: living rooms, dining rooms, bedrooms etc. Washer size: 5.0+ cubic feet or Commercial Machines. Plus, bigger rugs make the entire room look bigger. If you have a sectional, you should probably consider this size
